faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some of the most common questions we get asked. If you have a question that isn't answered here, feel free to reach out to us.

1.question: Is it accessible?
1.answered: Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern, ensuring accessibility for all users.

2.question: What features does the software offer?
2.answered: Our link management software offers features like link shortening, click tracking, customizable branded links, and AI-powered suggestions.

3.question: How does the pricing work?
3.answered: We offer three plans: Free, Pro ($9/month), and Business ($49/month). Yearly subscriptions come with a discount.

4.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
4.answered: Yes! You can easily upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time through your account settings.

5.question: Is there customer support available?
5.answered: Absolutely! We provide community support for all users and priority support for Pro and Business plan subscribers.

6.question: Can I track my link clicks?
6.answered: Yes, our software allows you to track clicks on your links, providing insights into user engagement and demographics.

7.question: Is there a mobile app available?
7.answered: Currently, we do not have a dedicated mobile app, but our web application is fully responsive and works well on mobile devices.

8.question: What payment methods do you accept?
8.answered: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment options.
